title: Publishing of session laws
context: ยง23G-13 Publishing of session laws. As soon as possible after the close of each session of the legislature, the revisor of statutes shall prepare for publication all laws duly enacted at such session, arranged in the order of their becoming law, together with a suitable index and tables showing what general statutes have been affected by the session laws. [L Sp 1977 1st, c 8, pt of ยง1]
